Therese Neumann von Konnersreuth - The Life Of The Stigmatic

Therese Neumann (8 April 1898?18 September 1962) was a German Catholic mystic and stigmatic.
She was born in 1898, on Good Friday, in the village of Konnersreuth in Bavaria, Germany.
This movie is about her life.
